text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump The current death rate for coronavirus in the U.S. is 1.1% It has been running at 1.2 to 1.3% over the past few days. Trump said the flu death rate is .001%. Wrong! The flu death rate is 0.1%. With CORRECT figures, the coronavirus is currently 11 times deadlier than the flu.
